title: Disfonctionnement de la boîte Courrier entrant sur Thunderbird
content:
Sur mon Thunderbird lorsque j’ouvre les messages arrivant dans la boite « Courrier entrant » de mon compte mail principal, celui vers lequel je fais arriver tous les messages envoyés à toutes mes adresses mail, eric.friesguggenheim@orange.fr ils ne se présentent pas normalement en mode de lecture de message mais en mode « Rédaction » et en bas de page apparaît le mode d’erreur suivant : Une identité unique n’a pas été trouvée. Le message sera envoyé en utilisant l’adresse d’expédition actuelle avec les paramètres de l’identité Éric Fries Guggenheim <eric.friesguggenheim@orange.fr>. Si je les sauvegarde à ce moment-là ils se retrouvent dans la boîte brouillon de l’adresse principale.


Lorsque j’ouvre les messages arrivant dans la boite « Courrier entrant » de mon compte mail principal, celui vers lequel je fais arriver tous les messages envoyés à toutes mes adresses mail, prénom.nom@orange.fr ils ne se présentent pas normalement en mode de lecture de message mais en mode « Rédaction » et en bas de page apparaît le mode d’erreur suivant : Une identité unique n’a pas été trouvée. Le message sera envoyé en utilisant l’adresse d’expédition actuelle avec les paramètres de l’identité prénom.nom@orange.fr Si je les sauvegarde à ce moment-là ils se retrouvent dans la boîte brouillon de l’adresse principale.

Causes possibles ? Comment réparer ?
creator: eric.friesguggenheim

title: Thunderbird freezing; unable to open message; unable to close T-Bird
content: For over 1 week now I am finding that T-Bird freezes or locks after I have opened several messages. Leaves me unable to read or delete messages and unable to close down T-bird
creator: smurrays

title: Can't recieve email BUT can send?
content:
Hello, I'm a long time Mozilla user but I'm new to Thunderbird. I am setting up a new PC build with Windows 11 Home.

I've set up my Thunderbird with the incoming server imap.bellaliant.net port 143 outgoing server smtpa.bellaliant.net port 2225

The above servers were supplied buy my internet service supplier, although the support team originally gave me different servers. My ISP has stated security for both servers to be set no/none I can SEND emails but not receive incoming email. AS a note I can send and receive emails from my ISP's website using this email account. Do you have any suggestions. I realize this is a busy time of year, thank you. Kind Regards WS
creator: stepnoutnb

title: Impossibility to send messages from my email account (outlook)
content: Hello, I have an email account on hotmail(outlook). Since a few weeks, i can't send messages from this account. What have i to do to fix this issue ?

title: Deleting old emails
content: For some reason, I cannot delete these old emails or tried to delete them and they will not leave my screen. Just don’t know how to get rid of them any more. I’ve tried highlighting them I’ve tried this. I’ve tried that it just doesn’t get rid of them

title: After restore of Windows 11 unable to configure Thunderbird with correct profile
content:
My Windows 11 laptop became corrupted and the os had to be reinstalled with Microsoft's help. In the midst of all this I did not think of backups sadly. After the restore I started to put my apps back on and without thinking, I installed Thunderbird. I realized immediately my mistake when I saw only new email and no local folders.

The Windows restore created a windows.old directory and I see my profile and configuration files in it. I want to use those old files but I don't know where to copy them exactly. There is some confusion on my part about where the startup is happening for Thunderbird. I really need to have access to all my old mail and local folders.

I'd appreciate any help in this matter. Thanks, Sue
creator: suelupo10

title: How to Move Thunderbird to Gmail?
content: What is the free way to transfer emails from all configured accounts in Thunderbird + locally imported files to Gmail?
creator: olivia.bitrecover

title: Setting Up Response Templates in Thunderbird
content:
I often end up typing the same email response, over and over.

Is there a way to set up pre-made messages in Thunderbird, which are easy to select or migrate into my reply space?

Would also be nice if these pre-made response mssgs were separate from my in/out box accounts, so that if I change IMAP email provider, I don't lose the pre-made mssgs.
creator: jl11

title: Missinig Emails
content: Hello - When I logged into my email this moring a vast majority of my emails from previous days and in my filed emails are gone. Is there a way to get them back? Not sure what could have happened. Any assistance is appreciated!!! Thank you.
creator: j.lehman

title: duplicate accounts in Thunderbird
content:
I seem to have two accounts that seem to be identical. I am afraid if I delete one, they will both disappear. They are: Ke51ns@gmail.com and Ke51ns@gmail_2 I am not sure how long it has been this way, but the number of emails is getting out of hand.

Is there a way to combine the accounts? Should I just delete the second account?
creator: ke51ns
